name: Explosive Six
description:
当心六点！

目前仅支持在手机端（安卓/iOS）的浏览器上运行

Explosive Six! v1.1

The game currently ONLY supports playing in mobile (Android/iOS) browsers.

Your job is to carefully rotate a die to the destination without allowing 6 to face up, in which case the die explodes, causing the failure of the game. Various other elements, such as bubble tiles and arrows, come into play to spice up the challenge. You need to resourcefully plan your actions to navigate the die through the intricacies of the maps.

Features:

- 36 levels of increasing difficulty
- Repeatable tutorials
- Least possible moves displayed at each level for players to attempt
- Full support in two languages (Simplified Chinese, English)

If you have any further questions, please contact me on Reddit at /u/Rickole2 or email me at im_still_alive@163.com.
